content.instruction: You must output only a single JSON object with the following structure:

report.description: Advance warning signs missing on eastbound approach, non-compliant with manual standards.
Two workers observed without helmets, violating PPE compliance requirements.

rules: Do not include explanations, comments, or any other text.
Each entry must contain an 'id', 'type', and 'description'.
Use concise, technical, and professional English.
Descriptions must highlight compliance status (compliant/non-compliant) and reference observable details.
